About me

Some information that will help you know me better

Hi, I’m Jake Gamaro, 25 years old from the Philippines. I recently started working in this industry because I was unable to quit my former job due to a pandemic and found it difficult to find employment during that period. Now that the pandemic is not as bad, fortunately, an opportunity presents itself, so I seize it and begin my career transition by enrolling in a front-end web development course.

UI/UX Design

Creating Design using Figma, Photoshop and more. I can handle any project related to portfolio, business websites, and many more

Web Development

Front-end Web Development using HTML, CSS, SASS, Tailwind and Javascript. Back-end Development using MySQL and PHP

WordPress

Knowledge on using ACF, making template designs, custom post types, building dynamic pages

Projects

Some of the work I did for my previous client

Here are a few pieces I created for myself as well as some for my clients. I worked with my team on parts of stuff, designed some, and wrote the code for others.
